title: League at PAX East - Download the Minimap!

replies.body: I want to go, but tickets are sold out.

Its a Yordle called Rin The Yordle who was created by an artist who not coincidently also goes by the name of Rin The Yordle.
I wasn't able to respond forever, but finally I can. And I have to say, this is the BEST COMMENT I'VE SEEN ABOUT RIN, LOL! I am yordleception.
OMG Senpai hath deemed me worthy of notice! *Commence Fangirl Sequence* <333333 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
And PAX skins?
this i want to know as well

As people have posted, that's just my little Rin ^^; Sorry for confusing folks!

SCIENCE {{champion:74}}
dat is tristana
trist is next to ez, and has white hair.
Rin The Yordle, Tristana skin coming soon!

Hey guys! Wow, it took me a few days before I was able to post. I guess my account was bugged for a bit. HI!! I'M RIN! Nice to meet you guys! And thank you all SO MUCH for liking the drawing I made for this!

Also, IM REALLY SORRY FOR ANY OF YOU WHO GOT CONFUSED ABOUT RIN IN THE CORNER! I was encouraged to put her in, so I went for it. She's not a Tristana PAX skin, sorry! Nor is she Braum's awesome looking mech girl sketch that IronStylus made a while back!

I've had Rin for a total of 6 years now. [She's Heimerdinger's assistant, with a knack for hextechnology, specifically for her glider wings she's making.](http://rintheyordle.deviantart.com/art/To-the-skies-Rin-s-Wings-599207330) I use to be a lot more active on tumblr in the ask blogs, drawing little comics back, but it's since been a little slow. She actually started as a joke, but it stuck with me so I kept going with it, and eventually changed my name on league to "RinTheYordle" to play along with the fun! (though, I'd still highly encourage anyone who wants to write to, or make a blog on tumblr to do so! The ask blogs are fun and the artists and story writers there are AMAZING!)

Anyways, short story aside, I really, sincerely, am humbled that I'm getting to go to this event. This is my first PAX ever!! I'm really excited to meet you guys there! :D If you know me, and I'm able, I usually give hugs out of excitement, so uh, I HOPE THAT'S OKAY!

Anyways, for those of you going, hope to see you soon!!!! And if you aren't, I hope I get to see you guys at other conventions or events later on that I will be attending! (on my own that is, nothing with Riot! Like Summoner's Con! :D)

They should make a champ Rin The Yordle or at least a skin if you were ok with riot doing such a thing. your work is awesome and making a skin for tris or even a whole champ would be a great way to pay tribute to one of leagues great artist!

Well, she DEFINITELY doesn't function like Tristana, so that would just be odd XD But who knows! Honestly I know why Riot doesn't do fan created characters often as it can cause problems. Im not opposed to talking about the idea ever, but I doubt it would ever be. I'm honored as is that Riot lets me play around with Rin in content like this in the first place. It means a lot to me as just a community artist.
Who is the girl below Old Nashor? The one with red hair and goggles.
RinTheYordle! (the artist)
